title: Client not opening
body: So there is a bug, that i have to go through, and its rly annoying. So when i opne the game up first, everything is ok. But than, when i click launch, it doesnt load up the log in screen! Thankfully, i kinda found the way around it.. I go to task menager, find LoLClient.exe, and end the process tree. Than i go again, and it works! I might have to do it 2, or 3 times. Can u pls fix this? Its rly bothering me..

replies.body: It sounds like you might be having a security setting that's preventing the client from launching.  Check out our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to troubleshoot this towards a more permanent fix.  Hope that helps!
